name: odoo-companion
title: Odoo Companion
description: Search data into your own Odoo instance directly from Raycast
author: Taewenn

commands.name: search-projects
commands.title: Search Projects
commands.subtitle: Odoo Companion
commands.description: Query your Odoo projects to access directly the project in your browser, no more clicks !

commands.name: search-helpdesk
commands.title: Search Helpdesk
commands.subtitle: Odoo Companion
commands.description: Query your Odoo helpdesk to access directly the helpdesk in your browser, no more clicks !

preferences.name: odooUrl
preferences.title: Odoo Instance URL
preferences.description: URL of your Odoo instance (e.g., https://mycompany.odoo.com)

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Your Odoo API Key for authentication

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
